item.description:
This month’s guest speaker, Lucy Giuggio Carvalho, will inspire attendees with the following keynote, “Rays of Success: Take Your Vision from Idea to Reality.” Here she will share her experiences in building her organization, from its initial concept, to the success it has become today.

Lucy was diagnosed with breast cancer sixteen years ago. Today, with 25 years of healthcare experience, she is actively and joyfully participating in life. She is currently the Director of Case Management for Jewish Geriatric Services and has been a longtime supporter of the American Cancer Society. In 1994, she founded the Rays of Hope Walk Towards the Cure of Breast Cancer, which has raised more than $9 Million.

To ensure that our meeting runs smoothly, please submit your RSVP by Sunday, November 14th at 8pm. A limited amount of tickets will be available at the door for $18.
item.name: November Breakfast Meeting- Take Your Vision from Idea to Reality
